title: Must Read!!! More Deets from Congressman Cleaver on Terror Threat Against Kansas City
content:
Last week Republican leaders lamented that the U.S. has forgotten the impact of 9/11 . This week Congressman Cleaver worked furiously to help makes sure the same kind of catastrophe doesn't happen in Kansas City. 
 
Start the conversation, or Read more at Tony's Kansas City.
